name: Safer at Home Advisory
info: People over 65 and people with underlying conditions should stay home
People should only leave home for health care, permitted work, and outdoor activities
Ask for prescriptions to be filled for 90 days to limit trips to the pharmacy
Refrain from visiting nursing homes or other residential care settings (all residents are required to cover their faces when 6 feet separation can't be maintained)
Use remote means of communication (phone or video chat)
All residents advised to wash hands frequently for at least 20 seconds with warm, soapy water
Monitor for symptoms and stay home if you feel sick
This advisory is not enforceable, but it is encouraged
Social distancing and face covering guidelines are enforceable
